channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 01:25 Alarm lifted in Kyiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 01:25 Alarm lifted in Kyiv region. Follow further messages. #Kyiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 01:25 An alarm has been sounded in Cherkasy Oblast. Stay tuned for further messages.
